title: e-mail
content: Unable to receive e-mail via Mozilla Thunderbird. Receive message Server imap.shaw.ca has disconnected. Contacted server, informed that the email is all good. the problem is with the thunderbird application you will have to contact the thunderbird customer care because the email is all fine from our end. Also the shaw webmail is working fine so that means from our end everything is good.
creator: rgalois

title: Moving email data
content: When my 10 year old Windows laptop died it was a main board problem not a disk problem. I pulled the disk and can access it from my new Windows 11 laptop. Is the import tool the correct tool to pull all the Thunderbird data from the old disk and merge it with my new Thunderbird installation? Are there instructions available?
creator: rgounaud
